thread.title: Pocono Raceway to hold Cup qualifying and July race on same day
thread.title_full: Pocono Raceway to hold Cup qualifying and July race on same day

title: Pocono Raceway to hold Cup qualifying and July race on same day
text:
Feb 20, 2017 at 4:54p ET 0Shares 
Pocono Raceway announced today that its July 28-30 race weekend will feature Monster Energy Cup Series qualifying and the Pennsylvania 400 will both take place on Sunday. 
This moves means that all three series, ARCA, NASCAR Camping World Truck Series and the Cup Series will qualify and race on the same day throughout the weekend. 
The qualifying session takes place at 12:05 p.m. ET on Sunday will the race following at 3 p.m. ET on July 30. 
The first Pocono race weekend on June 9-11 will feature a more traditional setup with qualifying on Friday and the Pocono 400 on Sunday. BIG ANNOUNCEMENT: Our July weekend will feature @MonsterEnergy @NASCAR Cup Series qualifying & #PA400 on the same day! #WhatTurn4 pic.twitter.com/UDiQln73wo
